pages.content: Bar Xeito: A Culinary Gem in Cambados, Spain Home Bar Bar Xeito Rua Pombal, 18, 36630 Cambados, Pontevedra, Spain +34 689 94 76 94 $ $ Bar , Coffee shop , Pizza restaurant 997 reviews 09:00 AM - 01:00 AM Overview Menu Service Options Locations Reviews About This Place Welcome to Grubbio's culinary gem, Bar Xeito , located at Rua Pombal, 18 in the charming town of Cambados , Pontevedra. This delightful bar and restaurant has quickly forged a reputation for its inviting atmosphere and delectable menu, making it a must-visit for locals and tourists alike. The reviews say it all; Sandro Prado praises the spot as "perfect for a coffee or dinner," singling out their flavorful bocadillos . Meanwhile, Elena Paniagua Cabana raves about the sumptuous pizzas, highlighting the Mediterranean option topped with arugula, serrano ham, and parmesan shavings that tantalize the taste buds. Each bite offers a perfect balance of flavors, proving their culinary craftsmanship. One of the standout features of Bar Xeito is its inviting outdoor terrace. As noted by Inge GM , it provides a lovely setting to unwind, even in the heat of summer, thanks to generous shade from large umbrellas. The atmosphere enhances the dining experience, allowing visitors to linger and enjoy their meals in a delightful ambiance. The varied menu caters to various palates, including hearty burgers that receive rave reviews for their exceptional taste. Preethee discovered the salad with fruit, boasting a freshness that complements heavier offerings. With an open kitchen, Bar Xeito accommodates diverse dining schedules, appealing to tourists exploring the region. Despite some critiques about noise levels, the attentive and friendly staff consistently receive accolades, ensuring each guest feels at home. The ambiance, together with delectable food, creates a joyful gathering place, embodying the essence of Cambados . Whether you seek a quick coffee break or an indulgent dinner, Bar Xeito invites you to savor its dishes and enjoy its inviting environment. If you find yourself in Cambados, make sure this culinary haven is on your list. You won’t be disappointed! Highly recommended! Useful Funny Dodo BC 30/10/2025 Nous avons bien mangé, les plats étaient bons, la seule chose est que le wok aux légumes était trop salé avec la sauce soja. Le restaurant est très bruyant. Useful Funny Elena Paniagua Cabana 25/09/2025 ¡Nos ha encantado comer aquí! Las pizzas que preparan están súper ricas. Probamos dos de ellas: la mediterránea (rúcula, jamón serrano, y lascas de queso parmesano) y la romana (champiñones, aceitunas negras, y jamón). Ambas estaban genial, y para ser de tamaño “pequeño” eran bastante grandes, nos llegaron de sobra para todos los que éramos. También decir que en este local tienen una terraza interior al aire libre que es enorme, y que de hecho es en donde hemos comido, y se estaba allí de maravilla a pesar del calor abrasador (tienen muchas sombrillas grandes para estar a la sombra). Volveremos :) Useful Funny Preethee 19/09/2025 Fantastic find in Cambabos. They have an open flexible kitchen for extended hours - perfect for tourists who are coming in on different schedules. I tried the salad with fruit and it was delicious. Useful Funny Inge GM (EnMisLocuras) 15/08/2025 O Xeito Cambados es un sitio genial, súper acogedor y con una terraza preciosa que invita a quedarte horas. El trato del personal es de 10, siempre atentos y súper amables, te hacen sentir como en casa. Las hamburguesas... ¡espectaculared! Si estás por Cambados, no te lo puedes perder.
